name: Puzzle Slide
overview: Puzzle slide Created by Ze Emulatron from Lee Hurley productions in 2011 use a joystick in port 2 to move the pieces in the puzzle. The tile pieces used in this game were made in deluxe paint iii and can be replaced. They are named t1 image, t2_image etc. There is an example t1 on the disk that is the correct size. The files have to be converted with ifftrans that is from compute's second book of amiga, it has been included as ifftrans.Bas. The palette used in this game is in the file palette_colours. Each line has 3 values, red, green, blue.
